pkgmetadata.longdescription: Django-JSONEditor===================Django-JSONEditor is an online structured JSON input widget for Django appropriate for various JSONField's provided for Django.Code of the javascript JSONEditor online editor has been got from the http://jsoneditoronline.org/.See the latest versions of the javascript online JSON Editor here: https://github.com/josdejong/jsoneditorSample views:.. image:: https://raw.github.com/josdejong/jsoneditor/master/misc/jsoneditor.pngInstallation------------Latest version from the GIT repository:: pip install "git+git://github.com/nnseva/django-jsoneditor.git"Stable version from the PyPi repository:: pip install django-jsoneditorSee all details on https://github.com/nnseva/django-jsoneditor
